description:
At Mann & Kemp, PLLC, in Little Rock, Arkansas, the attorneys in our law firm focus on family law. With over 26 years of combined experience, we stand ready to be there for our Central Arkansas clients, providing outstanding advice, counsel and representation every step of the way.

Full-service law firm

While family law is our main focus at Mann & Kemp, PLLC, we know that people need representation in other legal areas as well. We therefore are proud to offer our services in the following areas:

  • Family law: divorce, child custody and support, visitation, spousal support, property division, pre- and postnuptial agreements, grandparents' rights
  • Probate and estate administration: wills, trusts, guardianships, commitments
  • Real estate: residential and commercial purchases and sales, subdivision development, project financing, construction contracts, listing and agency agreements

We are honored that our clients choose us to represent them in the legal challenges they face in their lives. We always treat our clients with the respect and dignity they deserve, fully communicate with them on a day-to-day basis, and keep them advised and informed throughout the course of their respective cases. After all, we are as invested in the outcomes of their cases as they are. We also are mindful of our clients' financial situations, and our law firm accepts all major credit cards for payment of our reasonable and competitive legal fees.
